code: import React from'react';import View from"react-native-web/dist/exports/View";import Text from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Text";import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import ScrollView from"react-native-web/dist/exports/ScrollView";import TouchableOpacity from"react-native-web/dist/exports/TouchableOpacity";import{Sparkles,Globe,MapPin,Music,Video,Calendar}from'lucide-react-native';import{Colors}from'@/constants/colors';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const categories=[{id:'for_you',label:'For You',icon:Sparkles},{id:'global',label:'Global',icon:Globe},{id:'local',label:'Local',icon:MapPin},{id:'music',label:'Music',icon:Music},{id:'content',label:'Content',icon:Video},{id:'events',label:'Events',icon:Calendar}];export const CategoryTabs=({activeCategory,onCategoryChange})=>{return _jsx(View,{style:styles.container,children:_jsx(ScrollView,{horizontal:true,showsHorizontalScrollIndicator:false,contentContainerStyle:styles.scrollContent,children:categories.map(category=>{const isActive=activeCategory===category.id;const Icon=category.icon;return _jsxs(TouchableOpacity,{style:[styles.tab,isActive&&styles.tabActive],onPress:()=>onCategoryChange(category.id),activeOpacity:0.7,children:[_jsx(Icon,{size:18,color:isActive?Colors.primary:Colors.textSecondary}),_jsx(Text,{style:[styles.tabText,isActive&&styles.tabTextActive],children:category.label})]},category.id);})})});};const styles=StyleSheet.create({container:{backgroundColor:Colors.background,borderBottomWidth:1,borderBottomColor:Colors.border},scrollContent:{paddingHorizontal:16,paddingVertical:12,gap:8},tab:{flexDirection:'row',alignItems:'center',paddingHorizontal:16,paddingVertical:8,borderRadius:20,backgroundColor:Colors.card,borderWidth:1,borderColor:Colors.border,gap:6},tabActive:{backgroundColor:Colors.primary+'15',borderColor:Colors.primary},tabText:{fontSize:14,fontWeight:'600',color:Colors.textSecondary},tabTextActive:{color:Colors.primary}});
